resources.string:
CREDITS

 Thanks to rovo89 for making the Xposed Framework!

 Thanks to wangtang2k for making the AT&T iconset, which inspired me to make this mod!

 Thanks to C3C076 for the center clock & transparent statusbar code!

 Thanks to snachez for making the default white iconpack!

 Thanks to all of the XDA users that find this mod useful!

 And a special thanks to those that have donated. Never required, but always appreciated!
